alert.note: Alert for Coleman; Runnels; Taylor (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 25 at 9:06PM CDT until April 25 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: The National Weather Service in San Angelo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Coleman County in west central Texas... Southeastern Taylor County in west central Texas... Northeastern Runnels County in west central Texas... * Until 1000 PM CDT. * At 906 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Lake Winters Lake, or near Bradshaw, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Tennis ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Crews around 925 PM CDT. Novice around 930 PM CDT. Glen Cove around 945 PM CDT. Talpa around 950 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Goldsboro, Lake Winters Lake, Lake Coleman, Ovalo and Hords Creek Reservoir. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. This storm is producing large hail. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows!
